CategoricalVariationDescriptor.description: This descriptor class is used for describing Categorical Variation value objects.

id.description: Descriptor ID; MUST be unique within document.

xrefs.description: List of CURIEs representing associated concepts.

extensions.description: List of resource-specific Extensions needed to describe the value object.

version.description: The version of the Categorical Variation Descriptor.

Extension.description: The Extension class provides VODs with a means to extend descriptions with other attributes unique to a content provider. These extensions are not expected to be natively understood under VRSATILE, but may be used for pre-negotiated exchange of message attributes when needed.
